title: 一有玩家加入就疯狂刷报错
author: 微笑大人
txt_content:
这是报错：
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/INFO]: [TAB] An error occured when setting placeholders (debug number: 24)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at net.milkbowl.vault.chat.plugins.Chat_GroupManager.getPlayerPrefix(Chat_GroupManager.java:271)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at net.milkbowl.vault.chat.Chat.getPlayerPrefix(Chat.java:67)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at net.milkbowl.vault.chat.Chat.getPlayerPrefix(Chat.java:91)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at me.neznamy.tab.Placeholders.replace(Placeholders.java:230)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at me.neznamy.tab.Placeholders.replaceMassively(Placeholders.java:152)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at me.neznamy.tab.HeaderFooter.getHF(HeaderFooter.java:86)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at me.neznamy.tab.HeaderFooter.send(HeaderFooter.java:54)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at me.neznamy.tab.HeaderFooter$1.run(HeaderFooter.java:29)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
[04:02:57] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 53/WARN]:         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

一直刷一直刷 后台都刷屏了

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
是placeholders使用vault或groupmanager的变量导致的问题。

如果你的是1.7.10的服务器下载版本对应的插件，有些变量并不支持，可以改回原来的

replies.author: 微笑大人
replies.txt_content:
skyliye 发表于 2019-6-26 17:35
是placeholders使用vault或groupmanager的变量导致的问题。

如果你的是1.7.10的服务器下载版本对应的插件 ...
1.11的服务器版本

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
你安装这个扩展插件看看，需要PAPI以及Protocollib作为前置




ChatInjector.jar
